text:
Published on Jan 13, 2011

Feeding a family is difficult enough in today's economy. Now some politicians want to put taxes on a lot of groceries, like soft drinks, sports drinks, even flavored waters. I can decide what to buy without government help. Government needs to trim its budget fat and leave our grocery budgets alone.
title: "Give Me a Break" Americans Against Food Taxes TV Ad 2011
